example_note: Backhoe PIN plate at LH loader tower pivot; PIN also stamped on chassis; components carry their own plates.
Skids/CTL: check rear under LH lift arm on newer models; older machines used kick-plate area in cab.
Cab frame below windshield (RH) and frame near boom base; ID plate inside cab.
PIN plate on machine flank; serial plate under seat (LH) inside cab; engine/axle/trans plates present.
Cab-side plate near floor; some later units moved forward on LH side.
Chassis/cab jamb plates with stamped frame backup.
